name: The Battle For White Scar Cave
name_original: The Battle For White Scar Cave
description:
Set in the eponymous White Scar Caves, this Yorkshire setting hosts a battle between the Anglo-Saxons and the Vikings. The aim of the game is to eliminate all the viking warriors in the caves.

Vikings played a major role in shaping Yorkshire to what it is today. While holding the Yorkshire area, they cultivated the lands into large farming areas, and give York it's name (it was Jorvik during their occupation), which of course led to Yorkshire following its capital's name.

This game is inspired by retro dungeon crawlers, having tile based movement and timed attacks.

Controls: W to move forward, S to move backwards, A to rotate left, D to rotate right, Left Click to attack, Right Click to block

Credits: Jake Ogden; environment assets, level design, character assets. Jordan Hey; weapon assets, UI assets. Corey Shaw; programming. Daniel Vinti; audio assets.
